nodes.text: Mount Izukika was a snowy mountain on the planet Kijimi. The ancient Kijimi City and Kijimi City spaceport were located high atop Mount Izukika, between other surrounding mountains. During the New Republic Era, the young human Karr Nuq Sin and droid RZ-7 landed the yacht Avadora on Mount Izukika to refuel in the city. Granitic rock was quarried from Mount Izukika and used to construct Kijimi City's streets and buildings.
Mount Izukika first appeared in the young adult novel Force Collector, which was written by Kevin Shinick and published in 2019.
